attributes.action: allow all gurkas, past and present, to have the right to reside in the UK with a full pension for all qualifying soldiers, regardless of their place of residence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is raised to support all gurkas in their right to remain and reside in the UK, regardless of their dates of service.
The purpose is to raise political awareness of their current situation and to offer support for those who have served this country in the gurka regiment.
Further the right to a full military pension for those gurkas qualifying showld be established, regardless of the place they subsequently choose to reside.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
